overview: Legends among gospel quartets, the Jackson Southernaires have been recording since the 1960s. This behind-the-scenes look at the Grammy nominees takes you into the studio during the recording of their "Reality" release. "All I Need," "Hard to Get Along," "Reality" and "Keeping It Real" are among the tunes featured, and interviews with group members and retired member Rev. Charles Polk offer a personal experience that gospel fans will savor.
title: Jackson Southernaires: Reality
